headline: Corning Rides on Strength in Optical Communication: Will it Persist?

headline: American Superconductor, Orion, Commercial Vehicle Group, Corning, and 3D Systems Shares Are Soaring, What You Need To Know
summary: A number of stocks jumped in the afternoon session after an unexpected drop in the Producer Price Index (PPI) for August signaled easing inflation and raised expectations for a potential Federal Reserve interest rate cut.

headline: Will AI-Driven Trading Sentiment Reshape Corning's (GLW) Case Despite Weaker Fundamentals?
summary: In recent months, Corning Incorporated experienced a significant rise in market interest driven by strong institutional and AI-powered trading sentiment, even as the company continues to report weaker financial results and lower returns on equity compared to industry peers. This development highlights a striking disconnect between trading momentum based on sentiment and technical signals versus underlying company fundamentals such as declining earnings and limited reinvestment...

headline: UBS Projects Strong EPS Growth for Corning (GLW) in 2026 and 2027
summary: Corning Incorporated (NYSE:GLW) ranks among the best performing S&P 500 stocks in the last 3 months. On September 2, UBS boosted its price target for Corning Incorporated (NYSE:GLW) from $65 to $84 and upgraded it from Neutral to Buy. The firm cited continuous AI-driven fiber expansion that continues to outperform market expectations, which UBS predicts […]
